info.name: MindPulse API - Employee Wellbeing Platform
info.description:
Complete API documentation for MindPulse - an employee wellbeing analytics platform with emotional support chatbot.

## Features:
- JWT Token-based Authentication
- Role-based Access Control (Employee/Manager/Admin)
- Message Analytics with ML-powered sentiment analysis
- Emotional Support Chatbot with OpenAI integration
- Memory management and crisis detection

## Base URL: `http://localhost:8000`

## Authentication:
Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Include the access token in the Authorization header:
`Authorization: Bearer <access_token>`

response.name: Error - Invalid Role
Success - Employee Dashboard
Error - Access Denied (Manager trying Employee)
Success - Manager Dashboard
Success - Admin Dashboard
Success - First Message (New Conversation)
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Message processed successfully",
    "data": {
        "conversation_id": 12345678901,
        "message": "I hear you, and I can understand how overwhelming it must feel when work deadlines are piling up. It's completely normal to feel stressed in these situations - you're not alone in experiencing this. Sometimes when we're under pressure, it can feel like we're drowning, but there are ways to navigate through this.\n\nCan you tell me a bit more about what specific aspects of the deadlines are causing you the most stress? Is it the volume of work, the time constraints, or perhaps feeling unsupported?",
        "support_type": "validation",
        "user_message_analysis": {
            "sentiment": "negative",
            "sentiment_score": 0.85,
            "emotion": "sadness",
            "emotion_score": 0.72,
            "stress_detected": true,
            "stress_score": 0.89,
            "crisis_level": "moderate",
            "crisis_indicators": ["stressed", "overwhelming"],
            "support_request": "listening",
            "entities": ["work", "deadline"],
            "intent": "emotional_expression",
            "importance_score": 0.78
        },
        "escalation_needed": false,
        "conversation_status": "active",
        "timestamp": "2025-08-30T16:15:00Z"
    },
    "timestamp": "2025-08-30T16:15:00Z"
}

response.name: Success - Crisis Response
